title: Kolchak: The Night Stalker - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/16/22
itunes:title: Kolchak: The Night Stalker - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 9/16/22
description:
Guest host Richard Syrett and author Kendall Phillips explore the legacy of the 1970s horror television series Kolchak: The Night Stalker, how the story of a newspaper reporter investigating monsters was created, and why the series remains so influential fifty years later.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
